# Glossary

Here is a list of terms used in the Atlas and their definitions.

```{=html}
<div id="languageToggle" style="margin-bottom: 20px;">
  <label style="margin-right: 10px;">
    <input type="radio" name="language" value="EN" checked>
    English
  </label>
  <label>
    <input type="radio" name="language" value="FR">
    Fran√ßais
  </label>
</div>

<div id="output"></div>

<script>
  let currentLang = 'EN';
  let glossaryData = null;

  fetch("./../../data/shared/glossary.json")
    .then(response => {
      if (!response.ok) {
        throw new Error(`HTTP error! Status: ${response.status}`);
      }
      return response.json();
    })
    .then(data => {
      glossaryData = data;
      renderGlossary();

      // Set up radio button event listeners
      document.querySelectorAll('input[name="language"]').forEach(radio => {
        radio.addEventListener('change', (event) => {
          currentLang = event.target.value;
          renderGlossary();
        });
      });
    })
    .catch(error => {
      console.error("Error loading JSON:", error);
      document.getElementById("output").innerHTML =
        `<p style="color: red;">Error loading glossary: ${error.message}</p>`;
    });

  function renderGlossary() {
    if (!glossaryData) return;

    // Group entries by section
    const sections = {};

    Object.entries(glossaryData).forEach(([key, entry]) => {
      const section = entry.Section || 'Other';
      if (!sections[section]) {
        sections[section] = [];
      }
      sections[section].push({ key, ...entry });
    });

    // Build HTML
    let html = '<div>';

    // Sort sections alphabetically
    Object.keys(sections).sort().forEach(section => {
      html += `<h1>${section}</h1>`;

      // Sort entries within section by Term
      sections[section].sort((a, b) => a.Term.localeCompare(b.Term)).forEach(entry => {
        const acronym = entry.Acronym && entry.Acronym.trim() !== '' ? entry.Acronym : null;
        const definition = currentLang === 'EN' ?
          (entry['Definiton EN'] || entry['Definition EN'] || '') :
          (entry['Definition FR'] || '');
        const tooltip = currentLang === 'EN' ?
          (entry['Tooltip EN'] || '') :
          (entry['Tooltip FR'] || '');

        html += '<div style="margin-bottom: 30px;">';

        // Term heading with optional acronym
        if (acronym) {
          html += `<h2 style="color: #555; margin-bottom: 5px; font-size: 1.3em;">${entry.Term} (${acronym})</h2>`;
        } else {
          html += `<h2 style="color: #555; margin-bottom: 5px; font-size: 1.3em;">${entry.Term}</h2>`;
        }

        // Tooltip if available
        if (tooltip) {
          html += `<p style="color: #666; font-style: italic; margin: 5px 0; font-size: 0.9em;">${tooltip}</p>`;
        }

        // Definition
        if (definition) {
          html += `<p style="color: #444; line-height: 1.6; margin-top: 10px;">${definition}</p>`;
        }

        html += '</div>';
      });
    });

    html += '</div>';
    document.getElementById('output').innerHTML = html;
  }
</script>
```
